events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role and saved it in our tracking system.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to the candidate's software development experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's application and coordinate the recruitment process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s background, skills, and motivation for joining as a software engineer.
The candidate responded promptly, confirming availability for the next steps and expressing enthusiasm about the opportunity.
Scheduled a technical interview with the engineering team to evaluate the candidate’s coding and problem-solving skills next week.
The technical interview was successfully completed and the candidate demonstrated strong software development abilities and thoughtful problem solving.
An HR interview was scheduled to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations following the positive technical interview feedback.
The HR interview went well, with the candidate expressing strong alignment with our values and enthusiasm for the role.
An employment offer reflecting the agreed terms and compensation was proposed to the candidate, awaiting their decision.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer, expressing excitement and some questions regarding onboarding.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and confirmed their start date to begin the onboarding process.
The onboarding process was initiated with the new software engineer joining orientation and setup procedures.
The recruitment process was successfully completed and the candidate is now fully onboarded as a Software Engineer.
